languages.text: Вашу судьбу вытесали в камне. Фантазии о славных деяниях будущего мешают фокусироваться на действительности. Но когда-нибудь эти фантазии станут реальностью.
Your very life's path has been carved into stone. Images of your future deeds are distracting you from the here and now. But someday, those fantasies will become reality.
languages.original_text: Вашу судьбу вытесали в камне. Фантазии о славных деяниях будущего мешают фокусироваться на действительности. Но когда-нибудь эти фантазии станут реальностью.

traits.locale_text: Your life's path has been carved into stone. Fantasies of your future feats are distracting as you try to focus on the here and now. But someday, those fantasies will become reality.
Your life's path has been carved into stone. Fantasies of your future feats are distracting as you try to focus on the here and now. But someday, those fantasies will become reality.
Your very life's path has been carved into stone. Images of your future deeds are distracting you from the here and now. But someday, those fantasies will become reality.
Your very life's path has been carved into stone. Images of your future deeds are distracting you from the here and now. But someday, those fantasies will become reality.
Your very life's path has been carved into stone. Images of your future deeds are distracting you from the here and now. But someday, those fantasies will become reality.
Your very life's path has been carved into stone. Images of your future deeds are distracting you from the here and now. But someday, those fantasies will become reality.

languages.text: あなたの人生の道筋は、すでに石に刻まれている。将来自分が成す偉業の光景が、あなたの意識を今この時から逸らしている。しかし、いつかその幻想は現実となるだろう。
languages.original_text: Your very life's path has been carved into stone. Images of your future deeds are distracting you from the here and now. But someday, those fantasies will become reality.

traits.locale_text: あなたの人生の道筋は、すでに石に刻まれている。将来自分が成す偉業の光景が、あなたの意識を今この時から逸らしている。しかし、いつかその幻想は現実となるだろう。

languages.text: Yaşamında izleyeceğin yol, taşa işlendi. Gelecekte yapacağın kahramanlıklar seni şu anda olduğun yerden koparıyor. Bir gün düşlerin gerçek olacak.
languages.original_text: Your very life's path has been carved into stone. Images of your future deeds are distracting you from the here and now. But someday, those fantasies will become reality.

traits.locale_text: Yaşamında izleyeceğin yol bir taşa işlenmiş. Gelecekte yapacağın kahramanlıklar seni şimdideni olduğun yerden koparıyor. Bir gün düşlerin gerçek olacak.

languages.text: La senda de tu vida está grabada en piedra. Las imágenes de tus actos futuros te distraen del presente, pero, algún día, esas fantasías se harán realidad.
languages.original_text: Your very life's path has been carved into stone. Images of your future deeds are distracting you from the here and now. But someday, those fantasies will become reality.

traits.locale_text: La senda de tu vida está grabada en piedra. Las imágenes de tus actos futuros te distraen del presente, pero, algún día, esas fantasías se harán realidad.

languages.text: 你的人生轨迹已经被刻在了石头上。尽管对未来的遐想会分散你此时此刻的注意力，但终有一天，这些预言都将变为现实。
languages.original_text: Your very life's path has been carved into stone. Images of your future deeds are distracting you from the here and now. But someday, those fantasies will become reality.

traits.locale_text: 你的人生轨迹已经被刻在了石头上。尽管对未来的遐想会分散你此时此刻的注意力，但终有一天，这些预言都将变为现实。

languages.text: Votre destin a été gravé dans la pierre. Les images de vos futurs exploits vous détournent du moment présent, mais un jour, ces rêveries deviendront réalité.
languages.original_text: Your very life's path has been carved into stone. Images of your future deeds are distracting you from the here and now. But someday, those fantasies will become reality.

traits.locale_text: Votre destin a été gravé dans la pierre. Les images de vos futurs exploits vous détournent du moment présent, mais un jour, ces rêveries deviendront réalité.

languages.text: Dein Lebensweg wurde in Stein gemeißelt. Bilder deiner zukünftigen Taten lenken dich vom Hier und Jetzt ab. Aber eines Tages werden diese Fantasien Realität.
languages.original_text: Your very life's path has been carved into stone. Images of your future deeds are distracting you from the here and now. But someday, those fantasies will become reality.

traits.locale_text: Dein Lebensweg wurde in Stein gemeißelt. Bilder deiner zukünftigen Taten lenken dich vom Hier und Jetzt ab. Aber eines Tages werden diese Fantasien Realität.
